title: ICE with `dyn Pointee`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code [playground](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2021&gist=97d96c0ce121ce4402a15ba37169aa32) ```Rust #![feature(ptr_metadata)] use core::ptr::Pointee; fn bar(_: &dyn Pointee) {} fn main() { bar(&42) } ``` Needs `cargo build` to reproduce, `cargo check` is not enough. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` 1.72.0-nightly (2023-06-15 114fb86ca08cfa6a9908) ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: i < this.fields.count()', /rustc/114fb86ca08cfa6a99087e0f0bc264d03590dc37/compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/layout.rs:792:21 ```
Backtrace

``` Compiling playground v0.0.1 (/playground) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: i < this.fields.count()', /rustc/114fb86ca08cfa6a99087e0f0bc264d03590dc37/compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/layout.rs:792:21 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f499b517c81 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h82daf1b810610fdf at /rustc/114fb86ca08cfa6a99087e0f0bc264d03590dc37/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f499b517c81 - clone 43: 0x0 - error: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.72.0-nightly (114fb86ca 2023-06-15) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type bin -C embed-bitcode=no -C codegen-units=1 -C debuginfo=2 note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `playground` (bin "playground") ```
